Abstract:
Technical Education- License Renewal for Campus Management software for 3 years &
Purchase of workstations (2 Nos) for Government Engineering College
Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad- Administrative sanction accorded - Orders issued.
Order Issued By:
(By order of the Governor)
C AJAYAN
Body Para:
As per letters read above, the Director of Technical Education has forwarded
proposals for License Renewal for Campus Management software for 3 years &
Purchase of workstations (2 Nos) for Government Engineering College,
Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad and has requested to accord Administrative Sanction.

2. The Departmental Working Group which met on 19.10.2020 considered the
above proposals and has recommended to accord Administrative sanction, as per the
minutes read as 3™ paper above.

3. In the aforesaid circumstances, Government are pleased to accord Administrative
Sanction for Government Engineering College Sreekrishnapuram, Palakkad, as detailed

below:
